alert.note: Alert for Pecos; Reeves; Ward (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 5:54PM CDT until September 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Pecos County in southwestern Texas... Eastern Reeves County in southwestern Texas... Southeastern Ward County in western Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 554 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles southwest of Grandfalls, or 26 miles northwest of Fort Stockton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grandfalls, Royalty, Coyanosa, and Imperial Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
